about_the_game:
miniLAW: Ministry of Law original soundtrack. All 32 tracks of high-quality audio featured in game.



Sounds of New Babel
miniLAW: Ministry of Law OST

Tracklist:
1. Mankind's Last Hope [Jack Daniels, 1:21]
2. miniLAW Title Theme [Jack Daniels, 2:25]
3. Mission Brief [Jack Daniels, 2:04]

7. 150BPM [Blokatt, 1:48]

10. Bust a Hoof [Jack Daniels, 1:16]

12. Club7 [Blokatt, 3:06]

14. Elevator [Jack Daniels, 1:00]
15. Funkay [Jack Daniels, 1:28]
16. GBM [Wil Whalen, 1:37]
17. Pad Beat [Blokatt, 1:28]
18. Hammerhead [Jack Daniels, 2:12]
19. Polyrain [Jack Daniels, 1:48]
20. Inversion [Jack Daniels, 1:26]
21. Digital Decay [Blokatt, 3:58]
22. Dead End [Wil Whalen, 2:10]
23. Bump (Reprise) [Jack Daniels, 1:08]
24. Nightclub [Jack Daniels, 1:06]
